titles: The third and fourth booke of ayres: composed by Thomas Campian. So as they may be expressed by one voyce, with a violl, lute, or orpharion
author: Campion, Thomas, 1567-1620.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham. Cum priuilegio,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
